results.name: a(n) = A327936(A003415(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 2..65539
program: A003415(n) = {my(fac); if(n<1, 0, fac=factor(n); sum(i=1, matsize(fac)[1], n*fac[i, 2]/fac[i, 1]))}; \\ From A003415
A327936(n) = { my(f = factor(n)); for(k=1, #f~, f[k,2] = (f[k,2]>=f[k,1])); factorback(f); };
xref: Cf. A327929 (positions of terms > 1), A341996, A341998, A341999.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 28 2021
